quote: The Christian Journey is not just to a place ""Heaven"", it is also to a person ""Jesus"". Ephesians 4:13 says ""Till we all come to the measure of the stature of the fullness of Christ
quote_letters: THE CHRISTIAN JOURNEY IS NOT JUST TO A PLACE HEAVEN IT IS ALSO TO A PERSON JESUS EPHESIANS  SAYS TILL WE ALL COME TO THE MEASURE OF THE STATURE OF THE FULLNESS OF CHRIST
